dict.acceptation: 手；协助，帮助；（工具等的）把，柄；掌管；

sent.orig: Hand-me-up is a used object an article of clothing, passed from a younger personan older person.
sent.trans: Hand-me-up就是年轻一代用过的然后传给比自己年长的一代人继续使用的物品，多指衣物。

sent.orig: And a hand in this case isn't really your hands, but it means a person.
sent.trans: 在这种情况下hand不再指手了，而它指一个人。

sent.orig: They are forced hand became tired change the hand, the hand became tired change hand again.
sent.trans: 他们只好左手累了换右手，右手累了又换左手。

sent.orig: We hand-in-hand, hand-in-hand with an indomitable spirit to meet with a better tomorrow!
sent.trans: 我们手牵手，手牵手用一种不屈的精神一起去迎接美好的明天！

sent.orig: We hand hand, hand-in-hand with a Wei-an together to meet the breadth of a better tomorrow!
sent.trans: 我们手牵手，手牵手用一种伟岸的气魄一起去迎接美好的明天！
